name: Mahjong Cooking Tower
description:
Welcome to Mahjong Cooking Tower, THE best matching game!
Build your own restaurants, meet chefs and serve customers while playing your favorite mahjong layouts!

> Relax, match and keep your brain sharp!
Playing is easy as matching two tiles on the board. There are so many layouts to keep your experience fresh!

> Build Restaurants!
Pizza, hot dogs, tacos, asian food, and so on. There are variety of restaurants to build and plenty of chefs to cook with!

> Start Collecting Tile Sets!
Create your own Tile Sets while playing mahjong!

The experience keeps improving with each passing season as new content is included.

INSTALL IT TODAY!
